
### post-quiz Q1 B  {.smaller}

<!-- \lstset{
    language=myasm,
    morekeywords={mrmovq,irmovq,rmmovq,rrmovq},
} -->
 
```
rmmovq %rcx, 0(%rdx)  
    // reads: %rcx, %rdx
    // writes: data memory [no registers!]
nop
addq %rcx, %rdx
    // reads: %rcx, %rdx
    // writes: %rdx

```
 

* read to read $\\rightarrow{}$ <em>no dependency</em>

### post-quiz Q 2  {.smaller}



* goal: squash instruction currently in execute
* i.e. C disappears from the pipeline instead of advancing to memory
 ![](/caching/texfig/postQuizExplain-post-quiz-q-2.figure.svg)


### post-quiz Q 3 

<!-- \lstset{
    language=myasm,
    morekeywords={mrmovq,irmovq,rmmovq,rrmovq},
    moredelim=**[is][\btHL<1-2|handout:1>]{~1~}{~end~},
} -->
 

* our/book's CPU predicts branches as <em>always taken</em>
* use branch result at <em>beginning of jump's memory stage</em>
